page.title: 19EVENTS
page.content: Every year in June on a Saturday,West Heath has a carnival.It starts at Fairfax road and goes to the park.There are floats which are lorries that have been decorated .They are from different people and organisations.There is also a fair which lasts for three days as well as stalls for selling things and for playing games.A carnival queen is chosen before the carnival and is usually a local girl.They have a band playing and demonstrations by the police. They have a balloon festival in Cofton park every year also.
